book.synopsis: In this “ingenious” novel (New York Times) by “one of Europe’s most original and remarkable writers” (Los Angeles Times), a proofreader’s deliberate slip opens the door to romance-and confounds the facts of Portugal’s past. Translated by Giovanni Pontiero.
book.title_long: The History Of The Siege Of Lisbon
book.dimensions: Height: 8 Inches, Length: 5.3125 Inches, Weight: 0.69 Pounds, Width: 0.878 Inches
